parts: 4x NGK Iridium Spark Plugs (Part # 9029 or IFR5E11)
instructions: Open the hood and remove the engine cover (if present).
Remove each coil by unbolting it (10mm bolt).
Use the spark plug socket and extension to unscrew the old spark plugs.
Insert new plugs, hand-tighten, then torque to ~18–22 ft-lbs.
Reinstall coils, reconnect connectors, and replace cover.

parts: Front Brake Pads Set (Bosch, Akebono, or OEM)
instructions: Loosen lug nuts on front wheels.
Jack up the car and place on jack stands.
Remove the 14mm caliper bolts and slide the caliper off.
Apply brake grease to pads and pins.
Install new pads, re-mount caliper, reinstall wheels.

parts: Headlight Restoration Kit (3M, Meguiar’s, or Turtle Wax)
instructions: Apply UV sealant or clear coat.
